## HelpBubbleBuilderOptions.titleColor property

Color configuration for the title bar.

**Signature:**

```typescript
titleColor?: TitleColor;
```

## Remarks

Supports adaptive colors for light and dark terminals. Uses `ColorInput` from `@boba-cli/chapstick`<!-- -->.
